message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm looking to save some money on this purchase.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $87.50? That's a very fair offer considering the value you're getting.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. I'm really looking to save some money on this purchase.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair with my pricing here.  $85 is my final offer.  Let me know if that works for you.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. How about we meet at $82?
